mapper.sql: SELECT model, regdate, carno, totaldistance, totaloutcome, deleted FROM Car
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (historyno, model, regdate, carno, totaldistance, totaloutcome, deleted) VALUES (#{historyno}, #{model}, #{regdate}, #{carno}, #{totaldistance}, #{totaloutcome}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE Car SET deleted = '1' WHERE carindex = #{carindex}
